title: Begusarai
overview: Serious passions flare up in the godforsaken small village of Begusaray. Illegal reprisals, lynching are repaired by a wealthy family, which keeps all local residents at bay. However, the clan itself is torn apart from within by family squabbles, hatred, envy and harmful passions. The situation escalates to the limit when a charming dancer appears in the village.
